scripts.build: npm run build --w packages/shared && npm run build --w packages/server && npm run build --w packages/client
scripts.dev: npm run dev --w packages/shared && npm run dev --w packages/server && npm run dev --w packages/client
scripts.build:client: npm run build --w packages/shared && npm run build --w packages/client
scripts.build:server: npm install --w packages/server && npm run build --w packages/shared && npm run build --w packages/server
